comments.author: StakeGG
comments.body: I thoroughly enjoyed my time on Punt and will likely make it my preferred online casino moving ahead. It is very rare to see a brand new site that checks all the boxes a great domain, variety of games, generous odds, and an owner who seems to be in it for the long haul. It wouldn't surprise me if Punt.com is the #1 crypto gambling site by the end of the year by rate you're growing. Look forward to seeing you make a positive impact on this scene.By the way could you elucidate what 0% commission means in regards to Dice Duels. Does 0% commission mean that the duel is essentially a coin flip since the site doesn't take a percentage of the pot/wager. If so, that is incredible and something that crypto gambling has needed for a long time now.
